description: Radio Astronomy Gain and Visibility Inspector

parameters.info: The gain type table to be plotted
parameters.name: gaintype

parameters.info: Plot complex values as amp and phase (ap) or real and imag (ri)
parameters.name: doplot

parameters.info: Plot only this antenna, or comma-separated list of antennas. Default plots all
parameters.name: ant

parameters.info: Correlation index to plot (usually just 0 or 1)
parameters.name: corr

parameters.info: Minimum time to plot (default = full range)
parameters.name: t0

parameters.info: Maximum time to plot (default = full range)
parameters.name: t1

parameters.info: Maximum y-value to plot for upper panel (default=full range)
parameters.name: yu1

parameters.info: Minimum y-value to plot for upper panel (default=full range)
parameters.name: yu0

parameters.info: Minimum y-value to plot for lower panel (default=full range)
parameters.name: yl0

parameters.info: Maximum y-value to plot for lower panel (default=full range)
parameters.name: yl1

parameters.info: Matplotlib colour map to use for antennas (default=coolwarm)
parameters.name: cmap

parameters.info: Measurement Set to consult for proper antenna names
parameters.name: ms
